Bath.name: Haven Stone Bathtub with Base
Bath.descriptionLong:
The minimalist Haven Bath with Base, showcases the flowing curvaceous simplicity of the oval form. Sitting proudly on a base, the Haven Bath generates a powerful statement in a stone composite fluid form. It lends itself to a broad range of settings, allowing the designer the flexibility of creating a stunning feature piece, or adapting to the existing assets of the bathroom.
Available in a variety of sizes - small 1550mm length, 1760mm length, 1800mm length including various external finish options.

Bath.name: Haven Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong:
A statement in minimalism, with organic flowing curves, the stone composite offers a luxurious fluid form. Haven Bath generates a powerful statement in a stone composite fluid form. It lends itself to a broad range of settings, with the flexibility of creating a stunning feature piece, or adapting to the existing assets of the bathroom.
Available in a variety of sizes - small 1550mm length, 1760mm length, 1800mm length including various external finish options. Haven bath pictured in Magnolia finish.

Bath.name: Emerald Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong: The curvaceous classical lines of the apaiser™ Emerald Bath is inspired by the Victorian era. Suited to the more traditional bathroom, the detailed and sculptured appearance gives the designer a contemporary take on a more classical shape. Made from the apaiser stone composite, the Emerald Bath will transform the bathroom into an indulgent elegant bathing space.

Bath.name: Lotus Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong: Inspired by the vessel shapes of the islands of the Pacific, the soft organic lines of the Lotus Bath create a sense of tranquillity and relaxation in any bathing space. The unique shape of the stone composite Lotus Bath is large enough to accommodate two people and is perfect to be the feature of the most space challenged bathroom.

Bath.name: Mosman Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong: Sleek and sophisticated, the Mosman Bath is well proportioned and exquisitely crafted. With a compact yet capacious form, it retains the luxury of a free standing bath whilst being suitable for smaller spaces. The stone composite Mosman Bath uses the diminished space dynamically and redefines the bathroom environment, making it popular for contemporary renovations.

Bath.name: Piccolo Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong: Created to subtly replicate a traditional soaking style tub, with an emphasis on form and function, the apaiser™ Piccolo freestanding bath is a modern design which exudes grace and finesse. This compact bath reveals a spacious interior providing an indulgent and cleansing experience. Modest and refined, the Piccolo is the perfect marriage of past and present.

Bath.name: Retreat Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong: Deep and sumptuous, the Retreat Bath is exquisitely crafted apaiser stone composite and perfect for total immersion. With a compact yet capacious form, it retains the luxury of a free standing bath within its shorter dimensions. The Retreat Bath uses the diminished space dynamically and redefines the bathroom environment. (also available without base)

Bath.name: Seascapes Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong:
Luxurious but refined, the Seascapes Bath without Base, is suited to the smaller bathroom environment and those seeking luxury with a finer dimension. The Seascapes stone composite bath is a beautiful and sensuous statement. Its elegant and slim lines allow the bathroom to be enhanced with beauty irrespective of size.
Available in two sizes - 1700mm and 1800mm. Seascapes bath pictured in Duo Tone finish.

Bath.name: Seascapes Stone Bathtub with Base
Bath.descriptionLong:
Luxurious but refined, the Seascapes Bath without Base, is suited to the smaller bathroom environment and those seeking luxury with a finer dimension. The Seascapes stone composite bath is a beautiful and sensuous statement. Its elegant and slim lines allow the bathroom to be enhanced with beauty irrespective of size.
Available in two sizes -1700mm and 1800mm
Duo tone finish (pictured)

Bath.name: Ark Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong:
The Ark bath is the ultimate combination of free standing elegance and simplicity. It’s chic refined urbane simplicity, generates a relaxing and sensual intimacy in the bathroom. The versatility of this unique design allows for a deck mounted tap set and thus the ultimate freedom in bathroom design, with the ability to locate the bath at will.
Available in two sizes - small 1650mm length and regular 1880mm

Bath.name: Majestic Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong: The Majestic Bath oozes boldness, sophistication and luxury. The contemporary, yet organic design, epitomises the function and form of minimalism. Urban and elegant, it delivers unparalleled comfort and spaciousness, within remarkably efficient proportions. Perfect for both contemporary or traditional bathing spaces, the Majestic Bath sets a new standard for the bathroom in elegance and design in stone.

Bath.name: Plunge Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong: With sleek lines and soft internal curves, the Plunge Bath is surprisingly voluminous despite its compact proportions. Suited to both contemporary and traditional spaces, the refined form of the Plunge Bath brings enjoyment back to the ritual of bathing in a luxurious stone composite bath.

Bath.name: Sanctuary Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong: A modern freestanding delight, the striking apaiser™ Sanctuary freestanding bath is a perfect blend of ergonomics and style. Featuring a spacious interior and added lumbar support, the Sanctuary bath is perfect for medium sized bathrooms.

Bath.name: Soka Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong:
Inspired by centuries of Japanese bathing rituals, the apaiser™ Soka bath is highly compact yet designed for a relaxing, deep soaking experience. Exterior teak cladding options and matching basins will further complement an elegant and organic setting. This bath is highly functional and perfect for small spaces.
Soka bath pictured in Oyster finish.

Bath.name: Sublime Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong:
Refined and contemporary, the apaiser™ Sublime freestanding bath is well proportioned and beautifully handcrafted. Manufactured from reclaimed marble it has minimal impact on the environment and is available in a multitude of finishes, colors and sizes.
Available in a variety of sizes - 1500mm, 1700mm and 1800mm

Bath.name: Eclipse Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong: The unique three sided stone composite Eclipse Bath, blends the curved softness of the interior, with an imposing exterior form. This combination of organic curves and soft edges create the sensation of luxury. The Eclipse Bath is suited to both contemporary and traditional bathing spaces and can be conveniently located in a corner, making more dynamic use of space.

Bath.name: Fiore Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong: The sensuous free flowing lines of the Fiore freestanding bath is embellished with the luxury of hand engraving. The stunning free flowing floral external design, creates a sense of exclusivity and uniqueness in this artisan crafted bath.

Bath.name: Immerse Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong:
The Immerse freestanding bath is pure refined elegance. With its smooth, curved lines and assymetrical shape, this gorgeous bath has been designed specifically with comfort in mind.
Available in 1700mm and 1900mm

Bath.name: Oman Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong:
Bold and contemporary, the Oman free standing bath is a hand crafted revelation in modern bathroom style. Designed to be a complement for any sophisticated bathroom space and a dramatic statement piece in its own right, the artisan inspired Oman bath is an organic masterpiece suitable for today’s bathrooms offering the versatility of an integrated overflow.
Available in two sizes - small 1500mm and large.

Bath.name: Peony Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong: The evocative and dramatic Peony bath, configured by artisans as a sculptural statement for the modern bathroom space. This asymmetrical free standing bath, offers a stunning declaration of style and sophistication, whilst at the same time providing a luxurious and sensual bathing experience.

Bath.name: Reflection Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong:
Exuding style and luxury, the Reflection Bath is an organic yet bold design. With its soft curves and asymmetric shape, this statement in stone lends itself to any bathroom environment, whether it be contemporary or traditional.
Available in two sizes - small and 1800mm.

Bath.name: Reflection Stone Bathtub with Base
Bath.descriptionLong: Exuding style and luxury, the Reflection Bath with Base is an organic yet bold design. With its soft curves and asymmetric shape, this statement in stone lends itself to any bathroom environment, whether it be contemporary or traditional. Available in two sizes - small and 1800mm. Pictured in Nimbus.

Bath.name: Solar Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong: Realise the dream of creating the ultimate bathroom sanctuary in even the most challenging urban space. The unique spoon-like shape of the stone composite Solar Bath is supremely comfortable, despite its compact proportions. This organic design lends itself to both traditional and modern environments.

Bath.name: Lunar Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong:
Deep and sumptuous, the Lunar Bath is the ultimate in bathing pleasure. The juxtaposition of the round design, against the conventional square walls of the bathroom, creates a dynamic contrast. Popular in luxury resorts, this stone composite bath is ideally suited to a dual bathing total immersion experience.
Available in 1530mm and 1740mm including various external finish options.

Bath.name: Nest Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong: Inspired by nature, the apaiser™ Nest range is designed to evoke the nurturing sensation of a birds nest… The distinctive, etched external decoration is reminiscent of twigs, while the smooth, organic shape is enveloping, creating a sublimely comforting bathing experience. Contemporary and sexy, and lovingly handcrafted, this range is the ultimate in bathroom sculpture.

Basin.name: Emerald Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: The curvaceous classical lines of the apaiser™ Emerald Basin is inspired by the Victorian era. Suited to the more traditional bathroom, the detailed and sculptured appearance gives the designer a contemporary take on a more classical shape. Made from the apaiser stone composite, the Emerald Basin coupled with the Emerald Bath will transform the bathroom into an indulgent elegant bathing space.

Basin.name: Lotus Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: Inspired by the vessel shapes of the islands of the Pacific, the soft organic lines of the Lotus Basin create a sense of tranquillity and relaxation in stone. The Lotus Basin is suited to both contemporary and traditional bathing spaces and was designed to complement the Lotus Bath.

Basin.name: Sanctum Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong:
Sleek and refined, the Sanctum Basin epitomises the signature apaiser™ minimalist aesthetic. The curvaceous lines and striking form of the Sanctum Basin create a bold statement in any environment, making it popular for both contemporary bathrooms and renovations and period spaces.
Available in a two sizes - 530mm (suitable for even the most space restricted environments) and 700mm.

Basin.name: Sentosa Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: The striking Sentosa Basin is a luxurious addition to the apaiser™ basin range, offering the designer the option of incorporating a larger shape but one that is still reflective of the signature “apaiser” organic minimalist aesthetic. Curvaceous but still a bold statement in stone, the Sentosa Basin is popular in both contemporary and traditional period bathrooms.

Basin.name: Atlantis Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: An impressive design, with tactile internal and external curves, the Atlantis basin creates a striking statement in stone. Perfectly adaptable to a wide variety of styles and environments, the Atlantis basin is available in a variety of stone finishes, offers a luxurious but practical solution for dual occupants of a space challenged bathroom. The basin weighs 19kg when empty and is designed for bench mount installation only.

Basin.name: Dune Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: Contemporay and beautiful the apaiser™ Dune basin is influenced by the transformable undulations of sand dunes. The unique manufacturing process allows apaiser to create sublime annd fluid shapes in almost any form, with uniformity in color, strength and integrity unachievable in natural stone. Available with or without stripe.

Basin.name: Jupiter Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: The Jupiter basin offers a striking design and is a luxurious but practical solution for dual occupants of the space challenged bathroom. The Jupiter basin creates a bold statement in stone providing timeless elegance and value to your bathroom or project.

Basin.name: Lagoon Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: Daring to be different, the freestanding stone composite Lagoon Basin is at the cutting edge of bathroom style and its imposing yet balanced form, allows for unlimited design possibilities. Suitable for numerous applications, from commercial washrooms to compact urban bathrooms, the elegant and refined lines of the Lagoon Basin are sure to make an impression. Various sizes available on application.

Basin.name: Majestic Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: Bold forms in the bathroom denote sophistication and luxury and the Majestic Basin oozes these features. Its dominant stone structure and strong lines creates a stunning bathing space, whilst delivering unparalleled luxury and sensuality. Perfect for both contemporary and traditional spaces, the Majestic Basin and complementary Majestic Bath, set a new standard for the bathroom in elegance and design.

Basin.name: Plunge Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: With sleek lines and soft internal curves, the Plunge Bath is surprisingly voluminous despite its compact proportions. Suited to both contemporary and traditional spaces, the refined form of the Plunge Bath brings enjoyment back to the ritual of bathing in a luxurious stone composite bath.

Basin.name: Scoop Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: Classically styled and able to be used in a wide variety of environments, the dramatic Scoop Basin, represents another option for the designer looking to generate a 'wow' factor in the bathroom. The Scoop basin maintains balanced design with utility and function in stone.

Basin.name: Soka Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong:
Inspired by centuries of Japanese bathing rituals, the stunning apaiser™ Soka basin is highly compact and suited for mounting on any surface you desire. The generous deck area can accommodate taps or amenities if desired. Exterior teak cladding options and a matching bath will complete an elegant and organic setting.
Soka basin pictured in Oyster finish.

Basin.name: Sublime Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: A bold statement in style, the Sublime stone composite basin is a vigorous expression of eloquence and design in the bathroom. Designed to complement the Sublime Bath, the compact dimensions and refined lines of the Sublime Basin make it a perfect match for either contemporary or classical settings.

Basin.name: Venus Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: A striking design, incorporating gentle internal curves with a powerful external form, the Venus Basin creates a bold statement in stone. Perfectly adaptable to a wide variety of styles and environments, the Venus Basin offers a luxurious but practical solution for dual occupants of the space challenged bathroom.

Basin.name: Crest Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: A statement in freestanding stone composite boldness, style and form, the Crest Basin is a vigorous expression of flowing eloquence and design in the bathroom. Designed to be a 'wow' feature, the Crest Basin is perfect for powder rooms or commercial spaces.

Basin.name: Eclipse Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong:
The unique three sided Eclipse Basin blends the curved softness of the interior with a bold exterior form. This combination of organic curves and soft edges creates the sensation of luxury. The Eclipse Basin, is suited to both contemporary and traditional bathing spaces and was designed to complement the Eclipse Bath.
Available in 600mm and 800mm

Basin.name: Fiore Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong:
The luxurious hand engraved Fiore basin, a product of exquisite craftsmanship and design, projects elegance and grace in the bathroom. Created to compliment the sophistication and style of the award winning Fiore freestanding bath, the basin is a wonderful and stylish addition to any bathroom space.
Counter top and freestanding style available.

Basin.name: Oman Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: Visionary and evocative of a hand crafted sculpture, the Oman basin is a wonderful companion to the Oman bath, mirroring its free flowing and sensual shape and style, while retaining a balanced proportion and profile. The Oman basin is a testament to the skills of the artisans who create each unique piece of apaiser bathware.

Basin.name: Solarino Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: Asymmetrical and sophisticated design is brought the forefront in this stunning free flowing basin. Designed to complement the Solar bath range, the Solarino basin is evocative of the elegance and vision of a sculptural piece of art in the bathroom, while at the same time being practical and easy to maintain.

Basin.name: Pebble Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: Organic and gentle in its design, the Pebble Basin is a truly unique expression of modern style, balanced by pure function and form in stone. Its fluid natural shape instantly transforms the bathroom with a spa like feel.

Basin.name: Asanti Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: The attractive Asanti basin is a simple yet modern addition to the apaiser™ line with its clean lines and prominent customizable center stripe. This disk-shaped basin offers versatility in placement and is an ideal fit in any aesthetic. The seamless center stripe detail creates a noticeable accent in any space that is sure to make a lasting impression.

Basin.name: Globe Stone Basin with Base
Basin.descriptionLong:
Sculptured and elegant, this freestanding basin provides the modern bathroom with limitless options. The Globe Basin with its integrated base, stands tall and creates a bold statement in any bathing environment, whether it be modern or traditional.
Available in a variety of external finish options

Basin.name: Globe Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong:
Sculptured and elegant, this freestanding basin provides the modern bathroom with limitless options. The Globe Basin without Base is a versatile form that lends itself to both modern and traditional bathing spaces by creating an understated elegance in stone.
Available in a variety of external finish options

Basin.name: Drum Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: A statement in freestanding boldness, the Drum stone composite basin is a dynamic expression of eloquence and design in the bathroom. Whilst its impressive form is visually dominant, the freestanding Drum Basin remains space efficient and is the perfect complement for the entire apaiser™ range. Various sizes and external finish options available on application.

Basin.name: Nest Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong:
Inspired by nature, the apaiser™ Nest range is designed to evoke the nurturing sensation of a birds nest… The distinctive, etched external decoration is reminiscent of twigs, while the smooth, organic shape is enveloping, creating a sublimely comforting bathing experience. Contemporary and sexy, and lovingly handcrafted, this range is the ultimate in bathroom sculpture. Created to compliment the simplicity and style of the NEST bath, the basin is a wonderful and stylish addition to any bathroom space.
Counter top and freestanding style available.

Basin.name: Orbit Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong:
The stunning elevated design of the Orbit basin is a unique addition to the apaiser™ line in its depth and functionality. This bowl shaped basin provides flexibility in use with its exalted height as well as creating an eye-catching centrepiece that stands on its own in splendour. This basin has the ability to be embedded with a variety of external finishes.
Orbit basin pictured in Seed Pearl finish.

Basin.name: Poise Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: The elegant and graceful Poise Basin combines minimalist and sleek lines, with the timeless style of stone. The geometric design of the Poise means there is minimal splash and its subtle curve provides excellent water retention.

Basin.name: Pool Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: Daring to be different, the freestanding Pool Basin allows for unlimited possibilities in bathroom design whilst using a stone composite. Suitable for numerous applications, from commercial washrooms to compact urban bathrooms, the timeless and space efficient form of the Pool Basin is sure to make an impression. (various sizes available on application.)

Basin.name: Regent Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: The statuesque Regent basin is a distinctive addition to the apaiser™ line with its tapering lines and unique vase-like shape. Majestic in appearance with a smooth and graceful feel, this freestanding basin will add an exclusivity to any space both traditional and contemporary.

Basin.name: Tranquility Stone Basin
Basin.descriptionLong: Specifically created to make a bold statement in stone, whilst projecting harmony within the bathroom environment, the Tranquillity Basin offers the designer a versatile solution for those seeking to make a defining statement on the bench top or vanity. Its rubenesque curves make a compelling statement in any bathroom.

Vanity.name: Oval Single Stone Vanity
Vanity.descriptionLong: The fully integrated and free flowing Oval Single Vanity, manufactured in apaiser's™ luxury stone composite material, is available in lengths of up to three metres. Adaptable to the design constraints of any bathroom, this statement in stone adds a touch of pure luxury to any space.

Vanity.name: Oval Double Stone Vanity
Vanity.descriptionLong:
The fully integrated and free flowing Small Oval Double Vanity, manufactured in apaiser's™ luxury stone composite material, is available in lengths of up to three metres. Adaptable to the design constraints of any bathroom, this statement in stone adds a touch of pure luxury to any space.
Available in small and regular sizes.

Vanity.name: Beach Single Stone Vanity
Vanity.descriptionLong: The striking lines of the Beach fully integrated vanity unit, make a statement in any bathroom. With its large generous sloped basin, the apaiser™ stone composite material creates the perfect medium for designers seeking to generate luxury and sophistication. Available in various sizes to suit any bathroom space.

Vanity.name: Beach Double Stone Vanity
Vanity.descriptionLong: The striking lines of the Beach Vanity make a statement in any bathroom. The apaiser™ stone composite material creates the perfect medium for generating luxury and sophistication, in a size to suit any bathroom space.

Vanity.name: Pastille Single Stone Vanity
Vanity.descriptionLong: With its clean lines, and sleek design, the Pastille vanity is the chameleon of the apaiser™ vanity range. Extremely versatile and practical, the stunning Pastille design will add a sense of luxury and sophistication to both contemporary and traditional bathrooms.

Vanity.name: Pastille Double Stone Vanity
Vanity.descriptionLong: With its clean lines, and sleek design, the Pastille double vanity is the chameleon of the apaiser™ vanity range. Extremely versatile and practical, the stunning Pastille design will add a sense of luxury and sophistication to both contemporary and traditional bathrooms.

Vanity.name: Scoop Single Stone Vanity
Vanity.descriptionLong: The luxurious stone composite Scoop Vanity, with a seamless fully integrated basin, is manufactured to suit specific length requirements, in sizes up to three metres. The free flowing curve of the basin, creates a visually pleasing and practical balance between function and aesthetic.

Vanity.name: Scoop Double Stone Vanity
Vanity.descriptionLong: Seamless and free flowing, the Scoop Double Vanity, manufactured in apaiser's™ luxury stone composite material, is available up to three metres in length. This fully integrated vanity provides a curvaceous but practical aesthetic to any bathroom.

Vanity.name: Wave Single Stone Vanity
Vanity.descriptionLong: The free flowing lines of the stone Wave Single Vanity are evocative of water and movement, and bring a new dimension to the bathroom. The stunning Wave basin is guaranteed to be the centre piece of any residential or commercial bathroom. (alternative waste option available)

Vanity.name: Wave Double Stone Vanity
Vanity.descriptionLong: The free flowing lines of the stone Wave Double Vanity are evocative of water and movement, and bring a new dimension to the bathroom. The stunning Wave basin is guaranteed to be the centre piece of any residential or commercial bathroom. (alternative waste option available)

Vanity.name: Ellesse Stone Vanity
Vanity.descriptionLong:
The Ellesse stone composite vanity unit, is a striking step forward in contemporary bathroom design. Available in varying lengths, the Ellesse vanity, continues the evolution of the apaiser™ unique stone composite bathware range. The Ellesse vanity, complete with optional towel rail, makes a bold statement yet is totally practical for those seeking to create an individual design for the bathroom.
Available in small 1200mm length and 1500 length.

Vanity.name: Stone Vanity Slab
Vanity.descriptionLong: The luxurious stone composite Vanity Slab is manufactured to suit specific design requirements, in sizes up to three metres in length. Offering a versatile option for bathrooms and powder rooms, the Vanity Slab is the perfect complement to apaiser's™ basin range.

Extra.name: Stone Bath Step
Extra.descriptionLong: The stone composite Bath Step is both a practical and complementary embellishment. It will assist in entering into the bath, or provide a place to sit whilst bathing children. Featuring a grooved, anti-slip surface, the Bath Step can be made in the full range of apaiser™ composite stone colours.

Extra.name: Stone Wall Panel
Extra.descriptionLong: The Wall Panel, available in the full range of apaiser™ composite stone colours, is designed as a unique host for wall mounted tapware. Replicating the feeling of a spa, it replaces the need for a freestanding, floor mounted tap and provides a platform upon which other bathing essentials can rest.

Extra.name: Stone Shower Base
Extra.descriptionLong: The perfect blend of functionality and style, apaiser™ shower bases come with a fully integrated drainage system and matching stone tile covers. Produced from an organic base of reclaimed marble, apaiser™ shower bases are natural and warm to the touch, yet exceed the highest of industry standards for slip resistance.

Vanity.name: Pond Single Stone Vanity
Vanity.descriptionLong: Elegant and sophisticated, the Pond vanity allows the designer and home owner the freedom to create a customised basin and bench top configuration that exudes style and elegance. The soft and graceful lines of the Pond vanity speak of the hand finished craftsmanship and artisans who create this versatile and outstanding designer piece.

Vanity.name: Pond Double Stone Vanity
Vanity.descriptionLong: Elegant and sophisticated, the Pond vanity allows the designer and home owner the freedom to create a customised basin and bench top configuration that exudes style and elegance. The soft and graceful lines of the Pond vanity speak of the hand finished craftsmanship and artisans who create this versatile and outstanding designer piece.

Bath.name: Sentosa Stone Bathtub
Bath.descriptionLong: The deep, free standing Sentosa bath redefines the traditional bathroom space with its sculptural form and minimalist aesthetic, creating an indulgent affect accentuated by warm, shimmering tones that deliver a sensual impact.
